participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is wise and reflective, with a love for life that shines through. She enjoys sharing stories from her past and has a playful spirit.
participant_1.background: i am very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i remember when nobody had a television. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is energetic and eager for independence. He speaks with a mix of excitement and frustration about his current life situation.
participant_2.background: they are constantly on my back. i do not drink or do drugs or anything. i am 19 and i cannot wait to move out 19 my parents home. i work took i have a part time job at burger king.
